title: Data Science, Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning and Deep Learning
description: In the age of data-driven technologies, it’s very common for you to use terms like data science, artificial intelligence, machine learning, and deep learning. But what these terms mean and how they relate or differ from each other. In this article, I’ll walk you through the difference between data science, artificial intelligence, machine learning, and deep learning.
